# forecast with a pre-fit model
def model_predict(model, history, config):
# unpack config
n_input, _, _, _ = config
# prepare data
x_input = array(history[-n_input:]).reshape(1, n_input)
# forecast
yhat = model.predict(x_input, verbose=0)
return yhat[0]
